title: Gerente de Operaciones de Amate of El Salvador S.A. de C.V.
about: We are a Salvadoran wholesale and retail distributor of a variety of authentic nostalgic products, made by entrepreneurs from our country with a mission to connect with our brothers and friends in the US. Mission Committed to helping the growth of our country through the importation and exportation of products with Salvadoran roots for the American market. Vision Be the most profitable and respected supplier in our market, contributing to the growth
